channel.title: General and Off Topic
channel.description: The place to chat about anything, be it SkinCity or whatever you like

item.title: I miss the good old days...
item.author: invalid@example.com (daloonie)
item.dc:creator: daloonie
item.content:encoded:
If anyone sees this I'm sure you were part of it too. Guess only the old farts from the "naughties" remember this. SkinCity. Where everything cool and awesome for UT2k4 was shared and viewed.

Sorry for the nostalgic post.

item.title: The Birthday Thread
item.author: invalid@example.com (SaD)
item.dc:creator: SaD
item.content:encoded:
Before it starts again ppl complaining "too much B-Day-Threads here" ,
I start this topic and everyone , who wants to wish a happy B-Day can do so .

item.title: Site is broken completely...
item.author: invalid@example.com (Skillz)
item.dc:creator: Skillz
item.content:encoded:
What needs to be done to get it fixed? Who do I need to contact to correct the issue? Would really like to at the very least be able to browse the site for models, even if it's not possible to download them you can usually find them elsewhere on the web. Having all the images/screenshots of all the models so you can browse them makes finding what you need super handy.

I'd be willing to do the work if no one else wants to.

item.title: Hide? Still there?
item.author: invalid@example.com (-Tj-)
item.dc:creator: -Tj-
item.content:encoded: Anyone know if Hide's still around, or how to contact him? If you do, please PM me how I can get in contact with him. Or, if you're reading this, Hide, could you drop me a PM?

item.title: Happy Birthday SkinCity
item.author: invalid@example.com (SaD)
item.dc:creator: SaD
item.content:encoded:
Happy 11th SkinCity .
This little place was born 11 years ago .

Thank you all for the support over the years , be it visiting the place , having fun here at the board or submitting skins and models . :tup::tup:

item.title: Are there any modeling tutorials for Blender?
item.author: invalid@example.com (undyinglight)
item.dc:creator: undyinglight
item.content:encoded: Are there any modeling tutorials for Blender that are specifically for making a ut3 character? I tried searching but couldn't find any. Thanks.

item.title: More Health Console Command
item.author: invalid@example.com (Kaal979)
item.dc:creator: Kaal979
item.content:encoded:
I found out a very cool way to have more interesting bots in UT99.
Remember the console command

set classname variable value

(g.e.: set tmale2 health 499)

which allows to increase one classes health and such also beyond spawning.
To get the classnames open UED and browse actors/pawns.
I post this here to inspire modelers to make heavier foes for our UT99.

item.title: Public Service: Names Of All The "DUP" Bots In "UT2003/2004"
item.author: invalid@example.com (Starry Might)
item.dc:creator: Starry Might
item.content:encoded:
I've made a little list of all the "DUP" Bots in "UT 2003/2004", sorted by teams and the original characters whose models they use. I'm doing this as a public service to the skinners and modelers who look at this forum so that they don't inadverdently name their creation the exact same name as a "DUP" Bot.

===================
THE LIST!!:
===================
Egyptians:

Diva:
* Sphinx
* Isis
* Maat

Scarab:
* Natron
* Sunspear
*...

Public Service: Names Of All The "DUP" Bots In "UT2003/2004"

item.title: Help with UT3 model placement stuff
item.author: invalid@example.com (AizenSA)
item.dc:creator: AizenSA
item.content:encoded: ok can someone specify on where this stuff is actually supposed to go. I know it goes in the My games UtGame folder but, I need to know the specifics on where the individual files themselves goes. I downloaded various models and their files are scattered all about makin very difficult to figure out with they suppose to go. So far I screwed up my game having to reinstall... And When I just put them in how they are shown in the .rar file, it locks up my pc... Any help?

item.title: UT Models - Request for help via IRC
item.author: invalid@example.com (`Ghost`)
item.dc:creator: `Ghost`
item.content:encoded:
Hello SC'ers! As you may or may not know I offered SaD to use our #Vexel channel on Quakenet IRC for Skin City if he wished. Recently an SC user joined the channel and asked for help regarding a problem he is having with some of the UT99 models online. He signs into the channel quite frequently since first joining us so I said I'd ask on the forum for him (as he dislikes forum communication). Here's what I know;

<Yrol> `Ghost`` i use downloaded models for all bots. some are totally green,...

UT Models - Request for help via IRC

°DøNuT°

item.title: #A2.Gaming Moved
item.author: invalid@example.com (`Ghost`)
item.dc:creator: `Ghost`
item.content:encoded:
Just to let you know (not that any SkinCity members use the channel lol) that #A2.Gaming has moved to #Vexel as part of our new plan.

As mentioned to SaD a long while ago, Skin City are welcome to use #A2.Gaming as their IRC channel because it didn't have one of its own.

I intend for #Vexel to be a large gaming/social community and we're already in the middle of designing the website so as a long term fan of Skin City, once again I'm offering you to use #Vexel as your IRC Quakenet...

#A2.Gaming Moved

item.title: Happy Birthday SkinCity
item.author: invalid@example.com (SaD)
item.dc:creator: SaD
item.content:encoded:
After a long time of silence here , I have a news regarding this little place called SkinCity.

10 years ago the trip began with a little website on my 10 MB T-Online webspace.I collected Need for Speed : Hot Pursuit Cars and posted some pics of them.After Unreal Tournament was released I began collecting skins and models for it.This was the birth of SkinCity.I never imagined how long it will exist and how much skins and models would be collected.
Last count : 2533 skins and 728 models....

Happy Birthday SkinCity

item.title: Problem installing custom UT3 Models
item.author: invalid@example.com (Random Elite)
item.dc:creator: Random Elite
item.content:encoded:
I downloaded the KRod model from Skin City, and the readme tell me to copy code into the UTCustomChar.ini file.


There is no such file.


I created one myself, copied the code in, logged into UT3 AND... nothing. I only have the standard 5 classes/ species, and they don't appear as parts of armour either.

Guys... help?


EDIT: I just tried Spawn (also from SkinCity) and he works fine. no coding however.

item.content:encoded:
We aren´t dead . We have to do some work behind the scenes .

item.title: Hide the gun in 3rd persion view?
item.author: invalid@example.com (EdudDiputs)
item.dc:creator: EdudDiputs
item.content:encoded:
I posted this topic over here
http://utforums.epicgames.com/showthread.php?t=680659

But I wanted to see if ya'll know anything about how to do this.

The only examples that I can think of use custom animations so I am guessing that may be the only way to do this.

EdudDiputs said:
I've seen a couple of character models where the gun is completely hidden in 3rd person. Off hand I know that the Homestarrunner, Bass and old Megaman models all hide the gun in 3rd person....
Click to expand...
Hide the gun in 3rd persion view?
